Text:
Thanx for the upload! This is one of my favorites!

Can you tell me why are there some scenes missing in some of the episodes? For example in ''Who killed Mr. Burns?''
At the scene when Sideshow Mel arrives to the police station with Krusty and tells the police that they have captured the wrong man, Dr. Colossus doesn't show up! What's up with that?

also missing episodes as well.  3 of them. will continue to seed.

thanks raymond
Thanks for these! Too bad, that there are some episodes missing. The episode "22 short films about Springfield" could have been so awesome
dude..... 16,21&23 r missing....come on upload them pal
I appreciate all your hard work, I am a diehard, and in this country they dont sell the DVDs or anything like this.  You have cut them in a cool 1.6 Gig average, pretty cool also, thanks man!!
